titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to require that costs of imported natural gas be passed through to consumers in the same manner as such costs are passed through for domestically produced gas.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 5/12/1988--Introduced. Amends the Natural Gas Act to mandate that natural gas companies pass through to consumers the cost of imported natural gas in the same manner as the cost of domestically produced natural gas is passed through to consumers.
